Headline: #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wilson/Clarendon
ShortDescription: SB 135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temp rerouted via: Simmons, Marine Dr., Montrose, and Clarendon, due to, street blockage, near  Wilson/Clarendon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Simmons, Marine Drive, Montrose, and Clarendon, due to street blockage, near Wilson/Clarendon.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/North Avenue
ShortDescription: NB 50 Damen buses are temp rerouted via: Damen, Milwaukee, Western, Armitage, and Damen, due to, street blockage, near Damen/North Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via: Damen, Milwaukee, Western, Armitage, and Damen, due to, street blockage near Damen/North Avenue.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
